title: Draven main LF support to duo with.
body:
Yo dawgs, I'm an adc main who can play 80% of the Marksmans but I pretty much only play Draven. I'm Plat 1 and looking for a mad support who I can slay solo queue with.
Add me in game as "Draaaaaaven" or reply to this post.
I can TS and Skype.

replies.body: Hi id be interested add me. 513ucks.
Hey id be interested add me. Pompskyx3.
Hey id be interested add me. Zucladool.
Hey id be interested add me. Dom1nAtAr.
